about_the_game:
Rune Dice combines the strategic depth of deckbuilders with time-proven dice merging mechanics. Master ancient runes as you battle through increasingly challenging encounters.

Key Features:

  • Powerful Runes Collection

Discover and collect ancient runes, each with their own distinct powers and effects. From protective Shield runes to devastating Frost magic, build your collection and find powerful synergies between different rune types.

  • Deep Dice Merging Gameplay

Throw and merge dice in a physics-based arena to create powerful chain reactions. Every merge matters as you strategically combine dice to activate your runes powers and defeat waves of enemies.

  • Strategic Deckbuilding

Carefully construct your deck of runes, unlock powerful upgrades, and discover game-changing combinations. Your strategy in collecting and upgrading runes will determine your success in battle.

  • Tactical Turn-based Combat

Face diverse enemies that require different strategies to defeat. Armored foes shrug off small hits but crumble to poison, ranged attackers rain damage from afar, and melee units rush to overwhelm you. Watch out for special abilities - some enemies can explode, others regenerate armor each turn. Choose the right approach and timing to survive.

  • Mystical Relics

Find and collect unique relics that can dramatically alter your gameplay style. Combine them with your rune deck to create devastating combinations and unlock new strategic possibilities.

  • Roguelike Progression

Each run is unique, offering different paths, encounters, and rewards. Learn from each attempt, unlock new content, and discover increasingly powerful combinations as you progress through the game.

Build your collection of runes, master the art of dice merging, and create powerful synergies to overcome the challenges that await. Will you discover the perfect combination to achieve victory?
